item.description: This meet up will simultaneously serve to introduce local Scrabble players to each other as well as allow us to get a few games in. Bring your boards or just bring yourself! I will have 1 board of my own to use. If interest proves to be substantial, we could pool together for a few "public" boards to be used by the group.
item.how_to_find_us: Take a look at my profile picture. I'll be that guy. Minus the beard.
item.name: Scrabble Enthusiasts of Boston April Meetup
